title: Probably an obvious one (sans serif)
content:
Hey, I'm trying to ID this 'G'. The text on the cirle looks like Arial, but the G isn't. Tried the usual suspects, but too little time to keep searching. I'm sure one of you guys can ID it in a sec.

Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011022909im_/http:/typophile.com/files/gggg_6213.jpg)
author: Quincunx

comments.content: Yes, they could have flattened the top terminal... so quite possibly just an edited Arial...
